page.title: 14Fire and Ambulance Services.
page.content:
FIRE STATION - Corner of Lightfoot Lane-A6. A local fire station, and an Emergency Fire and Rescue Service dealing with a section of the motorway. In large fires the Control Unit Centre and the Brigade Canteen Van come from this centre. Firemen live in houses in the grounds and can be called out by using bleepers.
AMBULANCE STATION - Broughton House A6. This is the headquarters of the ambulance service for a large area. North to Cumbria and south to Gt. Manchester and Wigan. It has a front line Emergency Ambulance Service working with other resue services. Special services for surgery, lifting, and chemicals can be called for. A central control unit is in the grounds
